headline.print_headline: David Kritchevsky, 86, a Top Nutrition Expert
headline.main: David Kritchevsky, 86, a Top Nutrition Expert, Dies

docs.lead_paragraph: David Kritchevsky was a biochemist and expert in human nutrition who made groundbreaking studies of cholesterol and dietary fats and who pushed for balanced approaches to assessing health risks from foods.
docs.snippet: David Kritchevsky was a biochemist and expert in human nutrition who made groundbreaking studies of cholesterol and dietary fats and who pushed for balanced approaches to assessing health risks from foods.
